DOC.brief_summary: This is a first in man study to assess safety and tolerability of the IgG cleaving enzyme Immunoglobuli G degrading enzyme of streptococcus pyogenes (IdeS).
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study on IdeS in Healthy Volounteers
DOC.detailed_description: A phase I study (11-HMedIdeS-01, EudraCT no. 2012-000 969-21) first in man single ascending dose study in 29 healthy subjects to investigate if IdeS is safe and well tolerated in doses up to 0.24 mg/kg body weight (BW).
DOC.criteria: Ability to understand and sign informed consent BMI 1930 Clinically significant disease Positive HIV, hepatistis B or C Drug abuse Smoking Use of medication except paracetamol
